Operating company CitySpace

1 510 000 m² Area projects in construction and Fit-Out

Company City Space engaged in capital construction, design and fit-out. At the moment, more than 200 projects with a total area of ​​1,510,000 m² in the field of commercial and industrial real estate have been implemented.

Fit-Out

1 000 000 m²

completed projects

The experience of the company allows us to develop the optimal package of solutions for the implementation of an office project of any complexity in the shortest possible time. The company's services are used by the largest Russian and international companies, including Raiffeisenbank, Philips, Samsung, Gazprom Export, Alfa-Bank, Novatek and others.

Design

510 000 m²

completed projects

We build unique high-tech projects from the most modern business centers to elite residential complexes and world-class schools. The company provides a full range of services: from creating the concept of the project and drawing up working documentation, ending with the commissioning of the facility.

About us

City Space deservedly considered one of the leaders in the construction market in Russia. City Space offers General Contracting services and comprehensive solutions for the implementation of architectural and engineering design, capital construction, finishing and engineering equipment for public, office and residential premises. According to general estimates, the Company has already put into operation more than one million square meters. The company's capacities and resources allow it to work on facilities with a total area of ​​up to 70,000 m² at a time.

Over 200 projects

All over the world

Advantages of working with us

Detailed financial reporting every day: current costs and future costs.

We are the only KNAUF partners in Russia to assess the competencies of craftsmen

Official partners of AFI DEVELOPMENT for apartment renovation

An innovative method for managing repairs using the SCRUM method

We work with mechanized plaster and screed

The company is built to functional PMI standards (USA)

We are ready to show any object in operation for quality assessment

100% compliance with the requirements of the regulations

Management is ready to meet with the customer at any time
